SELECT room_ID, room_type, room_img, bed, bathroom, capacity, price_day, price_month FROM room WHERE room_ID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT room_ID FROM reservation_room WHERE res_date BETWEEN curdate() AND date_format(curdate()+1, '%Y-%m-%d'));

SELECT room_ID, room_type, room_img, bed, bathroom, capacity, price_day, price_month FROM room WHERE room_ID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT room_ID FROM reservation_room WHERE res_date BETWEEN #{checkIn} AND #{checkOut});
